whoweare.title: Strategy, technology, and innovation applied to business growth
whoweare.description: EKOU Solutions is a strategic consulting and technology development partner for companies and entrepreneurs seeking to evolve with real results. We are not a traditional agency: we work with a close, consultative approach grounded in strategy, technology, and practical innovation.

cards.title: What is EKOU Solutions?
cards.description: A strategic partner that integrates consulting, strategy, and technology to turn business goals into sustainable solutions.

cards.title: Who we support
cards.description: Companies and entrepreneurs that need to digitize, scale, or optimize with clarity and measurable outcomes.

cards.title: Consultative difference
cards.description: We go beyond deliverables, guiding decisions, execution, and continuous improvement with transparency and close collaboration.

services.title: How we support you
services.description: A strategic, iterative process focused on real results.

successes.title: Real impact
successes.description: Measurable outcomes that show the value of our solutions and how we support organizations.

phases.title: Phase 1
phases.subtitle: Strategy and Planning
phases.tagline: Avoid improvisation and move forward with confidence.
helps: We understand your context and goals
We define a clear and measurable plan

phases.title: Phase 2
phases.subtitle: Design and Prototyping
phases.tagline: Turn strategy into a clear experience.
helps: We test ideas with fast prototypes
We align the product with users

phases.title: Phase 3
phases.subtitle: Development and Launch
phases.tagline: Build, validate, and launch with confidence.
helps: We develop with a quality-first approach

members.name: Esteban Jimenez
members.description: The strategic mind. Transforms ideas into clear paths and guides the course with determination and global perspective.

members.name: Jouler Talaigua
members.description: The creative engine. Transforms visions into tangible solutions, breaking molds with ingenuity and originality.

members.name: Kevin Useche
members.description: The architect of action. Leads with technical precision and turns strategies into operational realities.

contact.title: Free technical consultation
contact.description: Tell us your idea. We help you turn it into a real solution.
